report.browser.description: Select Box for the user to select their browser
report.browser.message: Odaberite svoj Preglednik i Verziju - Već možete nabaviti verziju tako da posjetite about:support na Firefox-u ili chrome://help

report.bugcount.description: Amount of bug reports user can send

report.button.description: Button to send the information inputed.

report.description.description: Text for the user to write information about the bug.
report.description.message: Navedite vezu do primjera uživo ili nedvosmislenog niza koraka za reprodukciju ove greške.

report.error.description: User needs to input more notification

report.info.description: Tells the user about submitting a bug
report.info.message: Prijavljivanje grešaka je jedino za greške unutar PreMiD stranice i PreMiD Discord Server-a. Greške za Presence se moraju prijaviti stvaratelju Presence-a. Jedino prijavljujte greške u Engleskome.

report.os.description: Select Box for the user to select their operating system
report.os.message: Odaberite svoj Operativni Sustav i Verziju

report.overview.description: Text for the user to write a brief of the bug information.
report.overview.message: Dajte kratki i jasni opis greške.

report.toomany.description: User has too many active reports
report.toomany.message: Imate previše aktivnik prijava. Pričekajte da se vaše poslane prijave odriješe. Prijave su provjerene tjedno, budite strpljivi.

report.toomany.alert.description: User has too many active reports
